title: What is Lorem Ipsum?
description: Neque porro quisquam est qui dolorem ipsum quia dolor sit amet, consectetur, adipisci velit...
author: Ipsum girl
post: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

title: Why do we use it?
description: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout
author: Lorem Boy
post: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).

title: Marketing for non-marketing students
description: Teaching termins of marketing with extra-ordinary way
author: KAUTKIR
post:
"Marketing oʻqimaydiganlar uchun marketing"

1) Tadbirda chiroyli qizni koʻrib qoldingiz. Yoniga borib "Men judayam boyman, menga turmushga chiqing" -desangiz, bu DIRECT MARKETING. (Toʻgʻridan-toʻgʻri marketing)

2) Tadbirda chiroyli qizni koʻrib qoldingiz. Doʻstlaringizdan biri oʻrnidan turib, qizning yoniga borgach, sizni koʻrsatib, "Anavi doʻstim rosa boy, unga turmushga chiqing" -deb aytsa, bu REKLAMA 

3) Tadbirda chiroyli qizni koʻrib qoldingiz. Yoniga borib telefon raqamini oldingiz. Ertasiga qoʻngʻiroq qilib, "Salom, men juda boyman, menga turmushga chiqing" -desangiz, bu TELEMARKETING.

4) Tadbirda chiroyli qizni koʻrib qoldingiz. Oʻrningizdan turib, boʻyinbogʻingizni toʻgʻirlab, qizning yoniga borib, unga qahva taklif qilib, qahva ichib boʻlgach, mashina eshigini ochib, uni uyiga eltib qoʻyishingizni aytib yoʻl-yoʻlakay "Darvoqe, men juda boyman, menga turmushga chiqing" -desangiz, bu PUBLIC RELATIONS (PR, ijtimoiy munosabat marketingi)

5) Tadbirda chiroyli qizni koʻrib qoldingiz. U qiz sizning yoningizga kelib, "Siz juda boy ekansiz, men sizga turmushga chiqaman" -desa, bu BRAND RECOGNITION (Brendning odamlar tomonidan tan olinishi) 

6) Tadbirda chiroyli qizni koʻrib qoldingiz. Yoniga borib, "Men juda boyman, menga turmushga chiqing" -desangiz va u sizga boplab shapati tushirsa, bu CUSTOMER FEEDBACK (Mijoz fikri)

7) Tadbirda chiroyli qizni koʻrib qoldingiz. Yoniga borib, "Men juda boyman, menga turmushga chiqing" -desangiz va u sizni turmush oʻrtogʻiga koʻrsatib yuborsa, bu DEMAND AND SUPPLY GAP (Talab va taklif boʻshligʻi) 

8) Tadbirda chiroyli qizni koʻrib qoldingiz, yoniga borib hali biror narsa demasingizdan boshqa bir yigit kelib unga "Men juda boyman, menga turmushga chiqing" -desa, bu COMPETITION GETS YOUR MARKET SHARE. (Raqobatchilar sizning bozor ulushingizni olib qoʻyishi) 

9) Tadbirda chiroyli qizni koʻrib qoldingiz. Yoniga borib unga gapirmoqchi boʻlib turganingizda xotiningiz kelib qolsa, bu RESTRICTION FOR ENTERING A NEW MARKET. (Yangi bozorga kirishdagi cheklovlar) 


Marketingni oson tushintirishda davom etaymi?
